casebody.data:
Braun, Appellant, v. Styles et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Braun v. Styles (1970), 22 Ohio St. 2d 77.]

(No. 68-594 Decided April 22, 1970.) Messrs. Kelley, Grossheim $ Bavely, for appellant. Messrs. Bendigs, Fry, Kiely & Dennis and Mr. D. Marc Routt, for appellees.

Chief Justice Taft participated in this case which was, however, decided after his death.

 Per Curiam.

The judgment of the Court of Appeals is reversed and the cause remanded to the Court of Common Pleas for further proceedings on authority of Clouston *78v. Remlinger Oldsmobile Cadillac, Inc. (1970), 22 Ohio St. 2d 65.

Judgment reversed.

O’Neill, O. J., Schneider, Herbert, Duncan and Corrigan, JJ., concur.* Matthias, J., not participating.
